text_block_list.text: Several days have passed since the festival I went to with Inari One. When I was passing through the front gate of Tracen Academy――

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Let's see, the front gate is this way……oh, Uooh!! You're, from that time……！

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Tahaha, looks like ya found me. Well～, you see, the reason I came here……

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: ！……is that okay？ That'd be helpful！ Hehe……seems like the complete opposite from when we first met, huh？

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Haa～, I'd heard the rumors but, a huge dorm, huge gym, huge cafeteria…… and even this huuuuge training ground！

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: ……So this is Tracen Academy, huh. Well, the facilities are all like that too――

text_block_list.name: Both Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa, haa, haa, haa……！！

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: (Are they doing……parallel running？ From the looks of it, they're nearing the end……seems like they're competing with each other while feeling out the timing for their attack……)

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume A
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa…… right here……！ HaaaAAAAa！！

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: (Uoh！？ Already！？ Ain't it too early to push forward……！？)

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume B
text_block_list.text: ……！ No…… not yet……！！

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume A
text_block_list.text: Kuu…… Fine, in that case……I'll keep pushing forward like this！！

text_block_list.name: Both Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: DaaAAAAAAー！！

text_block_list.name: Both Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Haaa, haaa, haa……！！

text_block_list.name: Instructor A
text_block_list.text: Good. Last time your assignment was to supplement your last leg performance. Pushing forward early and trying to draw your opponent in to a stamina battle――it's a good tactic！

text_block_list.name: Instructor A
text_block_list.text: Let's raise your stamina more and more. We'll switch the focus of your self training to that. And then, for you――

text_block_list.name: Instructor A
text_block_list.text: Good job not being drawn in！ Believing in your own last leg performance and maintaining your own pace until the end. Let's keep refining that sharpness.

text_block_list.name: Instructor A
text_block_list.text: Both of you, you're building up more ways to appeal to trainers. Let's build up some more while aiming for Selection Races！

text_block_list.name: Both Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Yes！ Thank you very much！！

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: (Selection, which means……wait wait, they're like that and they haven't even debuted yet！？ I heard the level here was high but――)
――Sorry. We'd like to use this place now, would you mind moving？

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Oh！ Sorry, I'll move now―― ……？
Oh my～. Are you here inspecting the school？ I'm sorry. Looks like we're bothering you～

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Ah, no, it's fine. It's not something ya have to apologize for……

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: (……Huh？ These two……what's with them？ There's a strange……sense of pressure――)

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: ……Hey. You, do ya know anything about those two？
choice_data_list: They're Oguri Cap and Super Creek
They're Oguri Cap and Super Creek

text_block_list.text: I answer her question. Both of them are Uma Musume who haven't debuted yet. However――
choice_data_list: Both of them have huge potential

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa, haa, haa, haa……！！ Right here……push forward！！

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Ufufu…… I won't let you！！

text_block_list.name: Oguri&Creek
text_block_list.text: HaaAAAAAAAa！！

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: (Hey…… hey, hey, hey, hey, what's with them！？ That white one, she had such a dopey look on her face just now, but with that kind of grit, it seems like a lie！)

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: (On the other hand, that big one！ It's hard to see…… the true depth of her potential！ Just looking at her…… it feels like I'll be overwhelmed……！)

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: What is this……what's with those two……！
Next to me, Inari One had her breath taken away. Judging by her reaction, she was completely overwhelmed by their parallel running, but……

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Eh?
choice_data_list: You can win against those two
You can win against those two

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: ――400m remain！ The leader is Oguri Cap, but Super Creek pulls forward！ Super Creek takes the lead！！

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: Super Creek and Oguri Cap……and here comes Inari One！！ Inari One pushes forward！！

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: DaaAAAARyaaAAAAA！！

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: 200m remain！ Who will take the lead this time, Inari One or Super Creek！？ The leader is――

text_block_list.name: Inari&Creek
text_block_list.text: OraaAAAAAAAAAAAAA！！ HaaAAAAAAーーー！！

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: Inari One！ It's Inari One！！ Inari One takes the lead！！ ――And goal！！

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: The one who emerges victorious from this heated battle is Inari One！！ The stands erupt in to a loud cheer！！

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: (……a narrow victory after a tough battle with opponents like these. An explosive cheer louder than fireworks, with the Chief and everyone from town there)

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: (And then, after I've won, those guys joyfully come runnin'――)

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Uwaaa！？ Ah……J-just now…… ………………

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: ……Sorry！ I need to…… get goin' now！！

text_block_list.name: Chief
text_block_list.text: ……Geez. I thought something like this might happen, you idiot.

text_block_list.name: Chief
text_block_list.text: We meet again, Trainer-san. Well then――

text_block_list.name: Chief
text_block_list.text: I'd like to ask you for a favor. ……Next time, there's a race I would like you to come and see, how about it？
